title: Free rider problem, undersupply of public goods

content.question: Private supply of public goods is most likely to result in

choices.label: less than the efficient level of output, due to the free-rider problem
less than the efficient level of output, due to the problem of insufficient competition
more than the efficient level of output, due to lower costs of private firms
more than the efficient level of output, due to the existence of externalities

content.answer: less than the efficient level of output, due to the free-rider problem

unit.text: 6: Market Failure and the Role of Government

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
